sn35.232:1.1: Ekam samayam ayasma ca sariputto ayasma ca mahakotthiko baranasiyam viharanti isipatane migadaye.
sn35.232:1.2: Atha kho ayasma mahakotthiko sayanhasamayam patisallana vutthito yenayasma sariputto tenupasankami; upasankamitva ayasmata sariputtena saddhim sammodi.
sn35.232:1.3: Sammodaniyam katham saraniyam vitisaretva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinno kho ayasma mahakotthiko ayasmantam sariputtam etadavoca:
sn35.232:2.1: “Kim nu kho, avuso sariputta, cakkhu rupanam samyojanam, rupa cakkhussa samyojanam …pe…
sn35.232:2.2: jivha rasanam samyojanam, rasa jivhaya samyojanam …pe…
sn35.232:2.3: mano dhammanam samyojanam, dhamma manassa samyojanan”ti?
sn35.232:3.1: “Na kho, avuso kotthika, cakkhu rupanam samyojanam, na rupa cakkhussa samyojanam.
sn35.232:3.2: Yanca tattha tadubhayam paticca uppajjati chandarago tam tattha samyojanam …pe…
sn35.232:3.3: na jivha rasanam samyojanam, na rasa jivhaya samyojanam.
sn35.232:3.4: Yanca tattha tadubhayam paticca uppajjati chandarago tam tattha samyojanam …pe…
sn35.232:3.5: na mano dhammanam samyojanam, na dhamma manassa samyojanam.
sn35.232:3.6: Yanca tattha tadubhayam paticca uppajjati chandarago tam tattha samyojanam.
sn35.232:4.1: Seyyathapi, avuso, kalo ca balibaddo odato ca balibaddo ekena damena va yottena va samyutta assu.
sn35.232:4.3: ‘kalo balibaddo odatassa balibaddassa samyojanam, odato balibaddo kalassa balibaddassa samyojanan’ti, samma nu kho so vadamano vadeyya”ti?
sn35.232:4.5: “Na kho, avuso, kalo balibaddo odatassa balibaddassa samyojanam, na odato balibaddo kalassa balibaddassa samyojanam.
sn35.232:4.6: Yena ca kho te ekena damena va yottena va samyutta tam tattha samyojanam.
sn35.232:5.1: Evameva kho, avuso, na cakkhu rupanam samyojanam, na rupa cakkhussa samyojanam.
sn35.232:5.2: Yanca tattha tadubhayam paticca uppajjati chandarago tam tattha samyojanam …pe…
sn35.232:5.4: na mano dhammanam samyojanam, na dhamma manassa samyojanam.
sn35.232:5.5: Yanca tattha tadubhayam paticca uppajjati chandarago, tam tattha samyojanam.
sn35.232:6.1: Cakkhu va, avuso, rupanam samyojanam abhavissa, rupa va cakkhussa samyojanam, nayidam brahmacariyavaso pannayetha samma dukkhakkhayaya.
sn35.232:6.2: Yasma ca kho, avuso, na cakkhu rupanam samyojanam, na rupa cakkhussa samyojanam;
sn35.232:6.3: yanca tattha tadubhayam paticca uppajjati chandarago, tam tattha samyojanam, tasma brahmacariyavaso pannayati samma dukkhakkhayaya …pe….
sn35.232:7.1: Jivha, avuso, rasanam samyojanam abhavissa, rasa va jivhaya samyojanam, nayidam brahmacariyavaso pannayetha samma dukkhakkhayaya.
sn35.232:7.2: Yasma ca kho, avuso, na jivha rasanam samyojanam, na rasa jivhaya samyojanam; yanca tattha tadubhayam paticca uppajjati chandarago, tam tattha samyojanam, tasma brahmacariyavaso pannayati samma dukkhakkhayaya …pe….
sn35.232:8.1: Mano va, avuso, dhammanam samyojanam abhavissa, dhamma va manassa samyojanam, nayidam brahmacariyavaso pannayetha samma dukkhakkhayaya.
sn35.232:8.2: Yasma ca kho, avuso, na mano dhammanam samyojanam, na dhamma manassa samyojanam;
sn35.232:8.3: yanca tattha tadubhayam paticca uppajjati chandarago, tam tattha samyojanam, tasma brahmacariyavaso pannayati samma dukkhakkhayaya.
sn35.232:9.1: Iminapetam, avuso, pariyayena veditabbam yatha na cakkhu rupanam samyojanam, na rupa cakkhussa samyojanam.
sn35.232:9.2: Yanca tattha tadubhayam paticca uppajjati chandarago, tam tattha samyojanam …pe…
sn35.232:9.4: na mano dhammanam samyojanam, na dhamma manassa samyojanam.
sn35.232:9.5: Yanca tattha tadubhayam paticca uppajjati chandarago, tam tattha samyojanam.
sn35.232:11.1: Imina kho etam, avuso, pariyayena veditabbam yatha na cakkhu rupanam samyojanam, na rupa cakkhussa samyojanam;
sn35.232:11.2: yanca tattha tadubhayam paticca uppajjati chandarago, tam tattha samyojanam.
sn35.232:11.5: na jivha rasanam samyojanam, na rasa jivhaya samyojanam;
sn35.232:11.6: yanca tattha tadubhayam paticca uppajjati chandarago tam tattha samyojanam.
sn35.232:11.8: na mano dhammanam samyojanam, na dhamma manassa samyojanam;
sn35.232:11.9: yanca tattha tadubhayam paticca uppajjati chandarago, tam tattha samyojanan”ti.
